articles.description: With a chance to stay in the winner's bracket on the line, the Wolfpack and Gamecocks head into Saturday night with plenty of pitching and bats for a huge showdown in the Columbia Regional.

articles.title: Elena Rybakina, reigning Wimbledon champion, pulls out of French Open because she is sick - The Associated Press
articles.description: PARIS (AP) — Reigning Wimbledon champion Elena Rybakina  pulled out of the French Open before her third-round match on Saturday because she is sick.
articles.content:
